verbs.description: [V: pinwheel] [ARG1: cookies] these pretty pinwheel cookies have tempting swirly layers of orange and chocolate i really mess up my kitchen whenever i bake a batch but the smiles on the faces of family and friends enjoying them make it all worthwhile cook
